Constructs a sentinel.

@1@ Default constructor. [[cpp/language/value_initialization|Value-initializes]] the underlying tuple of sentinels {{tti|end_}}.
@2@ Conversion from {{c|/*sentinel*/&lt;false&gt;}} to {{c|/*sentinel*/&lt;true&gt;}}. Move constructs the underlying tuple of sentinels {{tti|end_}} with {{c|std::move(i.end_)}}.
